siththara guru siya golaya lawa liyadun mila ganan meseya.maha brahmayage kate dath damimata rupiyal 600, diwyanganawange salu andawimata rupiyal 1000, kanthaka ashwayage kakul hathara hada – pata kirimata rupiyal 350, mara duwarunge thanapota bandimata, rupiyal 200, marayage aliyage kadunu dala sawikirimata rupiyal 500, sachchakaya mulumaninma repar kirimata rupiyal 1000, katu imbaula aluthen anda katu ul kirimata rupiyal 500, redi nathuwa siti yamapallanta redi andawimata rupiyal 500, chinchimanawikawage bada loku kirimata (dara dama) rupiyal 500, sundari paribrajikawage miniya hadala thiyanna rupiyal 100 saha redi nathuwa diwwa patacharawata redi andala pissu wattanna rupiyal 600.premadasa rodrigokaluthara
